roleset.name: make complicated

role.descr: agent, entity causing something to become complicated

roles.note: No example of beneficiary found with nominalization, but it may come up; see verb entry for example.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: His unnecessary complication of the explanation only confused the students.

example.name: Non-agentive complicator
example.text: The new experimental data's complication of the existing theory cannot be dismissed.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry complicate.01, OntoNotes grouping complication-n senses 1-3; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Medical, complicator as "from" PP
example.text: He died of complications from the surgery.
